summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2478 for the improvement of West Sixty-fourth Street, from Twenty-second Avenue Northwest to Twenty-sixth Avenue Northwest, all in The City of Seattle, by resurfacing and curbing the same, and by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks thereon, and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 25742 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
